overview: Momentum Volume. 3 takes us into the woods for an ethereal, refreshing, female-focused break. Join this group of beautiful, natural women at their retreat for naked yoga and lazy afternoons in the grass. Michelle Flynn brings us another spectacular solo scene in the heart of tranquility, followed by an intense but loving and intimate three way scene involving lots of licking, rubbing and restraint, proving yet again that anything is possible with ethical adult producers Light Southern.
title: Momentum, vol. 3
